subject: Football
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Harvard’s Zach Hodges will be one of the top small-college prospects in this week’s N.F.L. draft despite having had to confront tremendous obstacles in his life.
snippet: Harvard’s Zach Hodges will be one of the top small-college prospects in this week’s N.F.L. draft despite having had to confront tremendous obstacles in his life.
